product_name: Native Eyewear Perazzo Polarized Sunglasses - Women's
long_description: Make a fashion statement as well as protect your eyes with the women's oversize Perazzo Polarized Sunglasses from Native Eyewear. Polarized Crystal Carbonate(R) optical-quality, impact- and scratch-resistant lenses block 100% of harmful UV light and eliminate glare for sharp, clear vision. Innovative and advanced polarized N3 lenses pass Z87.1 testing and feature up to 40% IR reduction, UV protection up to 400nm, and state-of-the-art blue light filtering. Rhyno-Tuff(R) Air frames endure extreme highs and lows in temperature. Venting system incorporated into the frames enhances airflow and virtually eliminates fog and condensation. Cushinol(TM) nosepads and temple boots keep your sunglasses in place, comfortably. 4-point Anti-Ocular Intrusion System(R) helps prevent lenses from getting into your eyes in the event of high-velocity impact. Cam-Action Hinges(TM) allow the temples to quickly lock into position, getting you ready for action. Native Eyewear Perazzo Polarized Sunglasses best fit women with a medium to large profile.
short_description: Make a fashion statement as well as protect your eyes with the women's oversize Perazzo Polarized Sunglasses from Native Eyewear.
